dataflow.description:
HNetConnect dataflow diagram for customer, doctor, and hospital.



HNetPay image link:

https://github.com/Crdenney/HealthNetworkIncThreatMapsxyz/blob/main/Stride%20HNetPay%20.png?raw=true

![](https://github.com/Crdenney/HealthNetworkIncThreatMapsxyz/blob/main/HnetEXchangeDiagram.png?raw=true "HnetExchange")![](https://github.com/Crdenney/HealthNetworkIncThreatMapsxyz/blob/main/HNetConnectDiagram.png?raw=true "HNetConnect")

mitigations.content: Implement proper encoding and escaping in user inputs
Data sanitization prevents attackers from using SQL code while in the authentication plane
Ensure that the principle of least privilege is introduced, so that the user does not have the ability to perform actions not needed.
Trusted platform module technology and secure boot used to ensure the system has not been compromised
Create backups that can be used to restore company data

Create a setting where AWS cannot create backups to external cloud environments, such as Google Drive.                                                                  Configure appropriate data sharing restrictions in cloud services. For example, external sharing in Microsoft SharePoint and Google Drive can be turned off altogether, blocked for certain domains, or restricted to certain users.

Data loss prevention can prevent and block sensitive data from being shared with individuals outside an organization. Add rules so that sensitive data is not shared with external cloud backup environments.

Ensure that low-privileged user accounts do not have permission to add access keys to accounts. In AWS environments, prohibit users from calling the sts:GetFederationToken API unless explicitly required.[13]

Monitor for changes to windows registry keys or values that may target multi-factor authentication mechanisms, such as smart cards, to gain access to credentials that can be used to access systems, services, and network resources.     DS0024 	Windows Registry 	Windows Registry Key Modification
Monitor for API calls associated with polling to intercept keystrokes.
Require key cards to access sensitive areas such as server rooms
Lifespan of cookies and session times on web application are limited
Enforce HTTPS on every web service. The website is not accessible without HTTPS.
Email gateway should filter out malicious emails
Security Awareness Training Program: All employees are provided with training regarding how to spot phishing attempts

metadata.value:
MFA is implemented to prevent unauthorized access, even if an attacker obtains a user's password

Deployed in web portal after user provides valid credentials

threats.statement: An external threat actor with ability to preform man-in-the-middle attack can strip the SSL/TLS from a victims connection, which leads to web server serving insecure HTTP connection, resulting in reduced confidentiality and/or integrity of Session information
threats.prerequisites: with ability to preform man-in-the-middle attack
threats.threatAction: strip the SSL/TLS from a victims connection
threats.threatImpact: web server serving insecure HTTP connection

threats.statement: A threat actor with access to a doctors account can edit a doctors profile information to include a malicous script, which leads to the threat actor compromising the browser session of a patient who visits the profile, resulting in reduced confidentiality and/or integrity of Web application, Doctor Database and HNetConnect
threats.prerequisites: with access to a doctors account
threats.threatAction: edit a doctors profile information to include a malicous script
threats.threatImpact: the threat actor compromising the browser session of a patient who visits the profile

threats.statement: An external threat actor who has access to the HealthNetwork web application authentication screen can use SQL injection techniques to bypass authentication, which leads to the attacker having more knowledge about authentication database and access to user account, resulting in reduced confidentiality and/or integrity
threats.prerequisites: who has access to the HealthNetwork web application authentication screen
threats.threatAction: use SQL injection techniques to bypass authentication
threats.threatImpact: the attacker having more knowledge about authentication database and access to user account

threats.statement: An external threat actor who has ability to modify authentication tokens can can operate under differnt users, which leads to threat actor evading security and impersonating user, resulting in reduced integrity, confidentiality and/or availability of HNetPay, HNetConnect, HNetExchange and Authentication Process
threats.prerequisites: who has ability to modify authentication tokens
threats.threatImpact: threat actor evading security and impersonating user

threats.statement: An external threat actor with access to hardware supply chain assets can modify hardware and firmware, which leads to the threat actor installing backdoor into development devices, resulting in reduced integrity and/or confidentiality of Developer accounts
threats.prerequisites: with access to hardware supply chain assets
threats.threatImpact: the threat actor installing backdoor into development devices

metadata.value:
# Supply Chain Compromise: Compromise Hardware Supply Chain

CVSS:3.1/AV:P/AC:L/PR:N/UI:N/S:C/C:H/I:H/A:H

7.3

threats.statement: A threat actor With access to development enviorment can deface company websites, which leads to web applications not being available, resulting in reduced confidentiality, integrity and/or availability of Web application, Web portal, HNetPay, HNetConnect and HNetExchange

A threat actor with access to a database can manipulate data, which leads to customers not having accurate data to make decisions on, resulting in reduced integrity and/or confidentiality of Doctor Database, Web application and customer database
threats.threatImpact: customers not having accurate data to make decisions on

threats.prerequisites: who has access to account which can create backups of cloud enviorment
threats.threatAction: exfiltrate cloud data through exfiltrating data to non-disclosed cloud backup
threats.threatImpact: exfiltration of company information, or customer health data
threats.statement: A threat actor who has access to account which can create backups of cloud enviorment can exfiltrate cloud data through exfiltrating data to non-disclosed cloud backup, which leads to exfiltration of company information, or customer health data, resulting in reduced integrity and/or confidentiality of customer database, doctor database and cloud enviorment

An external threat actor already has access to an account within the enviorment can can use internal account to engage in internal spearfishing, which leads to lateral movement, resulting in reduced integrity and/or confidentiality of Web application and Developer accounts
threats.prerequisites: already has access to an account within the enviorment
threats.threatAction: can use internal account to engage in internal spearfishing

threats.statement: An external threat actor who has access to the cloud environment with vast permissions can use the AWS command sts:GetFederationToken to create temporary credentials, which leads to attacker maintaining persistence on cloud environment, resulting in reduced integrity and/or confidentiality of internal databases and systems, HNetPay, HNetExchange and HNetConnect
threats.prerequisites: who has access to the cloud environment with vast permissions
threats.threatAction: use the AWS command sts:GetFederationToken to create temporary credentials
threats.threatImpact: attacker maintaining persistence on cloud environment

threats.statement: An external threat actor with ability to preform an SYN flood attack can flood the web application with SYN requests, which leads to web application services being down, resulting in reduced availability of HNetPay, HNetExchange, HNetConnect, internal databases and systems and customer data and web application
threats.prerequisites: with ability to preform a SYN flood attack
threats.threatAction: flood the web application with SYN requests

threats.statement: An external threat actor with access to a browser running the HNetConnect Web Portal can discover the cloud services running on the server, which leads to attackers using information gained to shape attack behaviors, resulting in reduced confidentiality, availability and/or integrity of HNetConnect, HNetPay, HNetExchange, Databases and Web portal
threats.prerequisites: with access to a browser running the HNetConnect Web Portal
threats.threatAction: discover the cloud services running on the server
threats.threatImpact: attackers using information gained to shape attack behaviors

threats.statement: An external threat actor intercepts multi factor authentication can use MFA to gain access to used systems on account, which leads to actor being able to view user information and database access associated with user, resulting in reduced availability, confidentiality and/or integrity of customer data and web application and Databases
threats.threatAction: use MFA to gain access to used systems on account
threats.threatImpact: actor being able to view user information and database access associated with user

threats.statement: An internal actor part of the Health Network team gains access to physical data center can destroy server racks or attempt to steal data, which leads to stolen information or damaged infrastructure equipment, resulting in reduced availability, integrity and/or confidentiality of customer data and web application
threats.prerequisites: part of the Health Network team gains access to physical data center
threats.threatAction: destroy server racks or attempt to steal data
threats.threatImpact: stolen information or damaged infrastructure equipment

metadata.value: Since the system is moving to a cloud based environment this threat is not applicable to health network

threats.statement: An external threat actor with ability to intercept packets on a network can steal session cookies from a user's browser, which leads to unauthorized access to account, resulting in reduced confidentiality and/or integrity of User Account
threats.prerequisites: with ability to intercept packets on a network
threats.threatAction: steal session cookies from a user's browser

threats.statement: An external threat actor can send a fraudulent email that can trick an employee into revealing their credentials and MFA token, which leads to attacker gaining access to coporate network, resulting in reduced confidentiality, integrity and/or availability of internal databases and systems
threats.prerequisites: can send a fraudulent email that
threats.threatAction: trick an employee into revealing their credentials and MFA token
threats.threatImpact: attacker gaining access to coporate network

threats.threatAction: gain access to web portal with stolen credintials
threats.threatImpact: them performing actions they should not be authorized to perform
threats.statement: A threat actor with stolen doctor credentials can gain access to web portal with stolen credintials, which leads to them performing actions they should not be authorized to perform, resulting in reduced integrity and/or availability of Doctor Database and HNetConnect
